abstract: FedEx is fighting a labor bill in Congress making it easier for workers to form unions by taking shots at its chief rival, U.P.S., which is unionized.
snippet: FedEx is fighting a labor bill in Congress making it easier for workers to form unions by taking shots at its chief rival, U.P.S., which is unionized.
lead_paragraph: THE word bailout has gone from descriptive to derogatory.

headline.main: Campaign Against Rival Could Haunt FedEx
headline.print_headline: A Campaign Aimed at a Rival Could End Up Haunting FedEx
